sentences: Tunni jooksul me lahendasime kaks Ã¼lesannet.
context: The Estonian word 'tunni' has multiple meanings depending on context. It can be the genitive case of 'tund' meaning 'hour', so it means 'of the hour' or 'in an hour'. It can also refer to something related to lessons or teaching, such as 'during the lesson'. The form indicates possession or relationship in Estonian grammar.
